events.message: Hello, I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to an incorrect order delivery.
Your case has been assigned to our customer support agent for further assistance regarding your refund.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I'm here to help with your refund request for the wrong item received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number to process the refund quickly?
Sure, I have attached photos of the delivered item and here is my order number: 123456789.
Thank you for the details. We have initiated your refund to the original payment method, which should appear within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and refund processing. I appreciate the prompt help resolving the issue.
The refund has been successfully processed and the case is now resolved. Please contact us if you need further assistance.
We are checking in to ensure that your refund was received and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
Your case has been formally closed. Thank you for your patience and please don't hesitate to reach out in the future.
